title: The cloud?
body:
Oh thy Cloud
who art thee?
floating by me
Darkness among light

title: Smarch
body:
Among all these people
I feel like I
don't fit in

title: Smile
body:
Grab it
Snap it
Hand it
With a smile

title: Fun fact 1
body: 'God' is the only character portrayed on The Simpsons to ever have five fingers.

title: Fun fact 2
body: 'The quick brown fox jumps over the lazy dog' is an English-language pangram—a phrase that contains all of the letters of the alphabet.

title: Fun fact 3
body: The average lifespan of a bear is around ten years, though black bears can live upward of 30 years in the wild.

title: Fun fact 4
body: As we get older, the pigment cells in our hair follicles gradually die. When there are fewer pigment cells in a hair follicle, that strand of hair will no longer contain as much melanin and will become a more transparent color — like gray, silver, or white — as it grows.

title: Quote 1
body: Don't go around saying the world owes you a living. The world owes you nothing. It was here first. – Mark Twain

title: Quote 2
body: Why can't I just eat my waffle? – Barack Obama

title: Quote 3
body: Some folks look at me and see a certain swagger, which in Texas is called 'walking.' – George W. Bush

title: Quote 4
body: You can put wings on a pig, but you don't make it an eagle. – William J. Clinton
